sentences.en: B : I have no objection. A: Then, please countersign them here.
sentences.cn: 我同意. 那么, 请在每张支票的这里复签.

sentences.en: Bank clerk: Would you please countersign them here?
sentences.cn: 银行职员: 您能在这儿复签一下 吗 ?

sentences.en: Dolores, please come in and countersign a cheque.
sentences.cn: 多洛雷斯，请进来连署支票。

sentences.en: Enclosed is our contract No. 345 in duplicate, of which please return us one copy, duly countersign.
sentences.cn: 随函附上我方第345号合同一式两分, 请会签并回寄一份.

sentences.en: If the Applicant is under 18, the guardian must countersign this Form.
sentences.cn: 凡年龄未满十八岁之申请者, 必须家长或监护人签署同意.

sentences.en: It was like the two halves of a countersign.
sentences.cn: 这倒像个接头暗号分成了两半.

sentences.en: The back shows petroleum prospecting and the countersign is the same as the 5 yuan.
sentences.cn: 此券背面图是石油勘探,暗号和五元券一样.

sentences.en: The note must be countersigned by a doctor.
sentences.cn: 这张证明必须有一个医生连署。

sentences.en: The President has so far refused to countersign the Prime Minister's desperate decree.
sentences.cn: 总统到目前为止仍然拒绝在首相那条孤注一掷的政令上连署签字。

sentences.en: The sentinel permitted the strangers to pass when they had given the countersign.
sentences.cn: 当这群陌生人说出口令后,哨兵就允许他们通过了.

sentences.en: Would you please countersign them here?
sentences.cn: 请您将支票副签一下,好 吗 ?

sentences.en: You must countersign on this line of the contract.
sentences.cn: 你必须在合同的这一行中复签.

sentences.en: You will receive our S and please countersign and return one copy to us for file.
sentences.cn: 您将会收到我们的销货合同,并请签署盖章后将该复印件寄回供我们存档.

trans.tran_en: to sign a paper that has already been signed by someone else
